# isAdditive

**Instance Property**

Determines if the value specified by the animation is added to the current render tree value to produce the new render tree value.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAdditive: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the value specified by the animation will be added to the current render tree value of the property to produce the new render tree value. The addition function is type-dependent, e.g. for affine transforms the two matrices are concatenated. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Property Value Calculation Behavior

- **isCumulative**: Determines if the value of the property is the value at the end of the previous repeat cycle, plus the value of the current repeat cycle.
- **valueFunction**: An optional value function that is applied to interpolated values.
